articles.title: Apple to pay $3.4-M over iPhone obsolescence in Chile - Manila Bulletin
articles.description:
SANTIAGO (AFP) - Apple has agreed to pay Chilean consumers $3.4 million in a lawsuit over programmed obsolescence of iPhones, their lawyer said Wednesday, the first such settlement in Latin America.



Apple is accused of having programmed a limited lifespan …
